meanings.definition: In a bold or daring manner
meanings.sent1: She climbed the tree venturesomely, reaching the top without fear.
meanings.sent2: He venturesomely explored the dark cave, unafraid of the unknown.
meanings.sent3: The cat ventured venturesomely onto the high shelf, surprising everyone.
meanings.sent4: The kite soared venturesomely in the sky, defying gravity.
meanings.sent5: The knight rode venturesomely into battle, ready to face any challenge.

meanings.definition: Showing a willingness to take risks or try new things
meanings.sent1: The venturesome explorer bravely crossed the raging river.
meanings.sent2: She is a venturesome entrepreneur, always seeking new opportunities.
meanings.sent3: The venturesome squirrel tried to steal nuts from the picnic basket.
meanings.sent4: His venturesome spirit led him to travel the world and experience different cultures.
meanings.sent5: The venturesome student volunteered for the challenging task, eager to learn.
